overview:
Nolin is a Founding Partner of BrainRider Knowledge Marketing Group, and a business-to-business marketing veteran who has worked for a number of small- and medium-sized technology companies.

Before BrainRider, he developed and executed marketing strategies and tactics for global ecommerce solution vendors FiftyOne Global Ecommerce and Canada Post Borderfree, technology branding firm Distility, global software vendor Platform Computing, a number of BrightSpark portfolio companies, boutique casino game developer Gametronics/IGSS, and others.

Nolin brings more than a decade of client-side experience and perspective to the table, and has a blend of marketing and technology expertise. His knowledge of marketing automation, prospect intelligence and sales acceleration has delivered results for companies selling to other companies throughout North America and Europe.

Nolin graduated from Wilfrid Laurier University with an Honours Bachelor of Business Administration degree and a minor in Philosophy.
